original_text: Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.
korean_text: 백부장이 그 된 일을 보고 하나님께 영광을 돌려 이르되 이 사람은 정녕 의인이었도다 하고

sentences.original_text: Now when the centurion saw what was done
saying, Certainly this was a righteous man
sentences.korean_translation: 말하기를, 분명 이 사람은 의로운 사람이었노라
